articles.author: Associated Press
articles.title: Ancient DNA hints at why multiple sclerosis affects northern Europeans - NBC News
articles.description: Ancient DNA helps explain why northern Europeans face a higher risk of multiple sclerosis: It’s a genetic legacy of a group that entered the area 5,000 years ago.
articles.content: Ancient DNA helps explain why northern Europeans have a higher risk of multiple sclerosis than other ancestries: Its a genetic legacy of horseback-riding cattle herders who swept into the region abou… [+3470 chars]

articles.title: China launches Einstein probe to hunt for X-ray bursts in space - CNN
articles.description: China and Europe partnered on the Einstein probe, which will use ‘lobster eyes’ to hunt for the X-ray light.
